name: Experimentum Project Questionnaires
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Data from a demo questionnaire on Experimentum <https://debruine.github.io/experimentum/>. Subjects are asked questions about dogs to test the different questionnaire response types.  Questions   * current: 	Do you own a dog? (yes/no)   * past: Have you ever owned a dog? (yes/no)   * name: What is the best name for a dog? (free short text)   * good: How good are dogs? (1=pretty good:7=very good)   * country: What country do borzois come from?   * good_borzoi: How good are borzois? (0=pretty good:100=very good)   * text: Write some text about dogs. (free long text)   * time: What time is it? (time)

variableMeasured.name: session_id
variableMeasured.description: The unique session ID assigned each time a user starts a project

variableMeasured.name: project_id
variableMeasured.description: The unique ID for the project (a collection of questionnaires and/or experiments

variableMeasured.name: quest_id
variableMeasured.description: The unique ID for the questionnaire

variableMeasured.name: user_id
variableMeasured.description: The unique ID for the user (subject/participant)

variableMeasured.name: user_sex
variableMeasured.description: The user's sex/gender (male, female, nonbinary, na)

variableMeasured.name: user_status
variableMeasured.description: The user's status (test, guest, registered, student,res, super, admin)

variableMeasured.name: user_age
variableMeasured.description: The user's age in years; calculated from birthdate

variableMeasured.name: q_id
variableMeasured.description: The unique ID of the question in the questionnaire

variableMeasured.name: order
variableMeasured.description: The order the trial was shown in (for experiments with randomised order)

variableMeasured.name: starttime
variableMeasured.description: The timestamp of the questionnaire start

variableMeasured.name: endtime
variableMeasured.description: The timestamp of the questionnaire submission
